title: (x) Creative Review Dec 09 Front Cover - Serif Gothic {Nick Cooke}
content:
Hey guys,

Does anyone know the typeface used on the front cover of Creative Review December 2009:

[img]http://creativereview.co.uk/images/uploads/2009/11/deccvr\_1.jpg[/img]

I think it is the same as the one attached too.

Thank you
